bio: Based in both Bangkok and Chiangmai, I'm deeply interested in integrating AI into Blockchain analytics. I enjoy build in public and advocate tech.
contributionDescription:
We streamline the process of launching analytics dashboards based on on-chain data, decoupling users from Dune Analytics. 

We offer an alternative way to host your own data pipeline, without the need for specialized data engineer knowledge. 

This means that new chains and roll-ups can have an analytics platform from day zero. There's no longer any need to wait for Dune to sync your network. 

This approach could expedite the creation of new dashboards and enhance transparency for new roll-ups.
impactDescription:
We empower people to analyze on-chain data using their own infrastructure and ease the process of setting up a data pipeline, even without any data engineering knowledge. To further lower the entry barriers, we've integrated a text-to-SQL feature, reducing the need for SQL fluency to query over on-chain data.

This could potentially boost blockchain engagement and adoption by both individuals and enterprises.
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, this application should be categorized as "INDIVIDUAL" as the bio section includes first person pronouns like "I" and "me".
pwCategorySuggestions: Blockchain Infrastructure, Web3 Community Platform, Developer Ecosystem
